mdRecord.dcterms:title: Moonlight on the Hudson: morceau pour le piano, op. 60 / par G.D. Wilson
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilson, G. D. (Grenville Dean), 1833-1897 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: At head of title: "To C. Fred. Emery, Albany, N.Y." [original]
Title page illustration: nighttime river scene with two sailboats and a rowboat embarking from the shore / Geo. H. Walker & Co. Lith. Boston. [original]
Oliver Ditson was at this address from 1877 until 1904. Cf. Early American sheet music / Dichter and Shapiro. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: M1 .S445 v.134 no.29: includes advertisement: "Exceedingly clever piano solos." [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: M1 .S445 v.134 no.29a: includes advertisement: "Dance music for the piano-forte." [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: M1 .S445 v.153 no.8: Lithograph by J.H. Bufford's Sons Lith., Boston. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Piano music
Hudson River (N.Y. and N.J.)--Songs and music
